grounded.translation[0].definitions[0].d: reasonable and in control of your emotions, even when this is difficult
grounded.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone who is grounded understands their own character and knows what is really important
grounded.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Simmons says that her family keeps her grounded.
grounded.translation[0].definitions[2].d: someone, especially a child, who is grounded is kept indoors as a punishment
